item.title: Setting Up Tests
item.description: Testing event-sourced applications requires specific infrastructure setup. This section shows how to configure PHPUnit and create a base test case for your Backslash application.

item.title: Writing Test Scenarios
item.description: The Scenario component provides a fluent, behavior-driven interface for testing event-sourced applications. It uses the Play class to define test scenarios in a readable, expressive Given-When-Then manner.
